import React from "react"; import eggImage from "../images/egg.png"; import fishImage from "../images/fish.png"; import chickenImage from "../images/chicken.png"; import fruitImage from "../images/fruit.png"; import vegitableImage from "../images/vegitable.png"; import riceImage from "../images/rice.png"; import meatImage from "../images/meat.png"; import spiceImage from "../images/spice.png"; const ProductCategories = () => { const [ads, setAds] = useState([]); const handleClick = async (category) => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/buyerproduct-ads?category=${category}`); setAds(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching product ads:", error); } }; return (

Our Product Categories

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Purus faucibus massa dignissim tempus.

{/* Egg */}
handleClick("Egg")} >

Egg

{/* Fish */}
handleClick("Fish")} >

{/* Chicken */}

); }; export default ProductCategories;
